title: Allow declaring properties using attributes rather than elements
body:
Item metadata in 15.0 can now use the much more concise attribute syntax like so:

`<Content Include="..." CopyToOutputDirectory="PreserveNewest" />`

Properties, however, are still stuck with verbose element syntax. 

It would be great if properties could be declared as attributes on a `PropertyGroup`, like so:

```xml
<PropertyGroup Condition="'$(Configuration)' == 'Debug'"
               OutputPath="bin\Debug"
               DebugType="full"
               DebugSymbols="true" />
```

This would bring parity in concise notation between items and properties.
